subject: [PATCH v2 2/3] cxl: export internal structs for external Type2 drivers

reviews.author: Gregory Price
reviews.summary: Raised a question about whether the redundant port lookup is actually necessary and suggested removing it to simplify the code.

2026-02-25.patch_summary: The patch proposes to remove a redundant call to cxl_pci_find_port() in the cxl_rcrb_get_comp_regs() function, simplifying the code and eliminating unnecessary port lookups.
